name: PostjamCarnageCars
description:
Controls: (Keyboard) - W,A,S,D || (Gamepad) - Gas-RightTrigger,A Brakes-LeftTrigger,B Steer-LeftStick

Continuation of my Compo Game CrudeCarnageCars40 for the Ludum Dare 40 (https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/40/crudecarnagecars40)

Cause mayhem in towns made of childrens play boxes with up to 750 Cars! (200~400 recommended for best experience).

Play with your friends locally! (Up to 4 Players - uses XInput)

Currently only supports Windows because of the use of XInput - if you have the strong urge for Linux or Mac Versions, leave a comment - even than it might take a few days because writing Controllerinput isn't that easy.
